text: Ralph Liguori (October 10, 1926 â€“ July 22, 2020) was an American racing driver. He was born in New York City. He competed in the USAC Championship Car series from 1957 to 1971 making 61 starts.Ralph Liguori at ChampCarStats.com His best finish was 2nd place at the Indiana State Fairgrounds Speedway in 1970. Liguori competed in 76 NASCAR Grand National Series races in his career. He had 30 Top 10 and 5 Top 5 finishes in his career. Liguori died on July 22, 2020 at the age of 93.Oval ace Ralph Liguori dies at 93 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American racecar drivers Category:NASCAR drivers Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Ralph Liguori
